languages.text: Протекторат фон Валанциус дестабилизирован возмущениями варпа и обрывом торговых и транспортных путей. Восстановление связи с ключевыми мирами обеспечит планетам Вольного Торговца снабжение и поддержку, необходимые в кризисный период.

The von Valancius protectorate has been destabilised by the disturbances in the warp and the severing of trade and transport routes. Restoring links with key worlds will provide the Rogue Trader's planets with the supplies and support they need in this time of crisis.
languages.original_text: Протекторат фон Валанциус дестабилизирован возмущениями варпа и обрывом торговых и транспортных путей. Восстановление связи с ключевыми мирами обеспечит планетам Вольного Торговца снабжение и поддержку, необходимые в кризисный период.

traits.locale_text: The von Valancius trade empire has been destabilized by the disturbances in the warp and the severing of trade and transport routes. Restoring links with key worlds will provide the Rogue Trader's planets with the supplies and support they need in this time of crisis.

The von Valancius trade empire has been destabilized by the disturbances in the warp and the severing of trade and transport routes. Restoring links with key worlds will provide the Rogue Trader's planets with the supplies and support they need in this time of crisis.

The von Valancius trade empire has been destabilized by the disturbances in the warp and the severing of trade and transport routes. Restoring links with key worlds will provide the Rogue Trader's planets with the supplies and support they need in this time of crisis.

The von Valancius protectorate has been destabilised by the disturbances in the warp and the severing of trade and transport routes. Restoring links with key worlds will provide the Rogue Trader's planets with the supplies and support they need in this time of crisis.

languages.text: 由于亚空间的扰动，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的贸易与运输路线被切断，王朝本身也变得岌岌可危。行商浪人需要恢复与关键世界之间的联系，只有这样，才能为其他行星提供所需的补给与支持，帮助臣民度过这个充满灾祸的时代。
languages.original_text: The von Valancius protectorate has been destabilised by the disturbances in the warp and the severing of trade and transport routes. Restoring links with key worlds will provide the Rogue Trader's planets with the supplies and support they need in this time of crisis.

traits.locale_text: 由于亚空间的扰动，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的贸易与运输路线被切断，王朝本身也变得岌岌可危。行商浪人需要恢复与关键世界之间的联系，只有这样，才能为其他行星提供所需的补给与支持，帮助臣民度过这个充满灾祸的时代。

languages.text: フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領は、歪み内での混乱と貿易と輸送ルートの遮断により不安定になっている。主要な惑星との連携が回復すれば、自由開拓者の惑星に、緊急時に必要な物資と支援を提供できるようになる。
languages.original_text: The von Valancius protectorate has been destabilised by the disturbances in the warp and the severing of trade and transport routes. Restoring links with key worlds will provide the Rogue Trader's planets with the supplies and support they need in this time of crisis.

traits.locale_text: フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領は、歪み内での混乱と貿易と輸送ルートの遮断により不安定になっている。主要な惑星との連携が回復すれば、自由開拓者の惑星に、緊急時に必要な物資と支援を提供できるようになる。

languages.text: El protectorado von Valancius ha quedado desestabilizado por las distorsiones de la disformidad y la interrupción de las rutas comerciales y de transporte. Restaurar los vínculos entre los mundos esenciales proporcionará a los planetas de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente los suministros y el apoyo que necesitan en estos tiempos de crisis.
languages.original_text: The von Valancius protectorate has been destabilised by the disturbances in the warp and the severing of trade and transport routes. Restoring links with key worlds will provide the Rogue Trader's planets with the supplies and support they need in this time of crisis.

traits.locale_text: El protectorado von Valancius ha quedado desestabilizado por las distorsiones de la disformidad y la interrupción de las rutas comerciales y de transporte. Restaurar los vínculos entre los mundos esenciales proporcionará a los planetas de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente los suministros y el apoyo que necesitan en estos tiempos de crisis.

languages.text: Das Protektorat derer von Valancius wurde durch eine Störung im Warp und den Verlust seiner Handels- und Transportwege destabilisiert. Die Wiederherstellung der Kontakte zu Schlüsselwelten wird die Planeten {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} mit den in diesen Krisenzeiten erforderlichen Vorräten und Hilfslieferungen versorgen.
languages.original_text: The von Valancius protectorate has been destabilised by the disturbances in the warp and the severing of trade and transport routes. Restoring links with key worlds will provide the Rogue Trader's planets with the supplies and support they need in this time of crisis.

traits.locale_text: Das Protektorat derer von Valancius wurde durch eine Störung im Warp und den Verlust seiner Handels- und Transportwege destabilisiert. Die Wiederherstellung der Kontakte zu Schlüsselwelten wird die Planeten {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} mit den in diesen Krisenzeiten erforderlichen Vorräten und Hilfslieferungen versorgen.

languages.text: Le protectorat von Valancius a été fragilisé par les perturbations du Warp et par la suspension de routes commerciales. Rétablir les liens unissant ses mondes principaux permettra de fournir aux planètes {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} les provisions et l'aide dont ils ont besoin en ces temps troublés.
languages.original_text: The von Valancius protectorate has been destabilised by the disturbances in the warp and the severing of trade and transport routes. Restoring links with key worlds will provide the Rogue Trader's planets with the supplies and support they need in this time of crisis.

traits.locale_text: Le protectorat von Valancius a été fragilisé par les perturbations du Warp et par la suspension de routes commerciales. Rétablir les liens unissant ses mondes principaux permettra de fournir aux planètes {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} les provisions et l'aide dont ils ont besoin en ces temps troublés.

languages.text: Von Valancius protektorası, öteboyut bozunumları ve ticaret ile nakliye rotalarının kesilmesi nedeniyle derinden sarsıldı. Kilit öneme sahip dünyalar arasındaki bağı yeniden kurmak, Hür Tacir'in gezegenlerine bu kriz döneminde ihtiyaç duydukları erzakı ve desteği sağlayacaktır.
languages.original_text: The von Valancius protectorate has been destabilised by the disturbances in the warp and the severing of trade and transport routes. Restoring links with key worlds will provide the Rogue Trader's planets with the supplies and support they need in this time of crisis.

traits.locale_text: Öteboyuttaki bozunumlar ve ticaret ve nakliye rotalarının kesilmesi nedeniyle von Valancius protektorası derinden sarsıldı. Kilit önem taşıyan dünyalar arasındaki bağı yeniden kurmak, Hür Tacir'in gezegenlerine bu kriz döneminde ihtiyaç duydukları erzakı ve desteği sağlayacaktır.
